  • 构造器详细资料

    • ServerAIO

      public ServerAIO()

  • 方法详细资料

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Set the AIO Server and prepare accept client to connect
      参数:
      args - port and file name
      抛出:
      IOException - if any IO problem

    • handleAccept

      public static void handleAccept​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel)
      once new client accepted, call this function and prepare to read message
      参数:
      clchnel - new client asynchrounous socket Channel

    • initRead

      public static void initRead​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, ByteBuffer buffer)
      Step into the read process
      参数:
      clchnel - a channel receive message send from a client
      buffer - receive message byte buffer

    • initWrite

      public static void initWrite​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, ByteBuffer buffer)
      Step into the write process
      参数:
      clchnel - the channel send message to a client
      buffer - send message byte buffer

    • readHandler

      public static void readHandler​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, ByteBuffer buffer, int bytesRead)
      Handler for read message bytes from the client sent
      参数:
      clchnel - new client asynchronous socket channel
      buffer - the byte buffer read the message bytes
      bytesRead - number of bytes have been read

    • MessageHandler

      public static void MessageHandler​(ByteBuffer msgbuffer, AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel)
      Message handler will process the sending message byte from a client. It will handler these message byte and will prepare to send message packet to a client
      参数:
      msgbuffer - buffer contains the message bytes send by client
      clchnel - client who send the message

    • writeHandler

      public static void writeHandler​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, ByteBuffer buffer)
      handler write bytes and send message to a client
      参数:
      clchnel - channel send message to a client
      buffer - message buffer

    • readItem

      public static void readItem​(File infile, fiat.serialization.ItemList list, String file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Read item from item file
      参数:
      infile - item file
      list - list memory
      file - file path
      抛出:
      FileNotFoundException - if file not found

    • writeItem

      public static void writeItem​(FileWriter fw, fiat.serialization.Add add, long modified, Logger logger)
      Client send a item to client, client can write the item into specific file
      参数:
      fw - File write
      add - Add message type
      modified - modified time stamp
      logger - log Server issues

    • handleInterval

      public static void handleInterval​(long time, fiat.serialization.ItemList tempList, File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Handle Interval message
      参数:
      time - interval time stamp
      tempList - declare a item list
      file - items file
      抛出:
      FileNotFoundException - if file not exists

    • failhander

      public static void failhander​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, String msg, Throwable e)
      handler a series fail events
      参数:
      clchnel - channel get message from clients
      msg - error message
      e - exception information

    • loggingInfo

      public static void loggingInfo​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, String msg, Logger logger)
      logging info level handler
      参数:
      clchnel - channel get message from clients
      msg - information message for processing
      logger - Server logger

    • loggingWarn

      public static void loggingWarn​(AsynchronousSocketChannel clchnel, String msg, Logger logger)
      logging info level warning
      参数:
      clchnel - channel get message from client
      msg - warning message for processing
      logger - Server logger
